name: Procedural
notes: Where a defect occurred in the procedure, either by virtue of non-compliance with the Disciplinary Code, or with statutory provisions.

name: Substantive
notes: Where there was a defect in terms of the substantive merits of the case, i.e. evidence, harshness of sanction, consistency, etc.

name: New Evidence
notes: Where new evidence exists which was not, and could not have been reasonably available during the initial enquiry.
